svg.text:
title: "Week in Ethereum News
September 21, 2024" date: "2024-09-21"
Eth News and Links
Pectra split into two upgrades with PectrA capped at devnet-3 EIPs & USDS stablecoin
live
All core devs
* All Core Devs ‚Äì Consensus (ACDC) #142 : Pectra (Prague + Electra) upgrade:
Pectra-devnet-3 : issues found by bad block fuzzer being debugged Pectra split
discussion : Pectra scope (PectrA) capped at EIPs in devnet-3 Second upgrade scope
(PectrB) yet to be decided, concerns on scope creep if not frozen, candidates include
PeerDAS & EOF, discussion on including Verkle ahead of EOF and proposal to add EIP7688
SSZ stable container Client team perspectives: Erigon & Prysm Base proposed Pectra
blob increase : client teams generally support increase of blob target but not max
count without PeerDAS, needs more analysis, IDONTWANT messages should reduce bandwidth
PectrA EIP improvements : changes to validator consolidation in EIP7251, deposit flow
in EIP6110, attestation refactoring in EIP7549 and opaque requests in EIP7685
* Pectra (Prague + Electra) upgrade: Pectra-devnet-3 : issues found by bad block
fuzzer being debugged Pectra split discussion : Pectra scope (PectrA) capped at EIPs
in devnet-3 Second upgrade scope (PectrB) yet to be decided, concerns on scope creep
if not frozen, candidates include PeerDAS & EOF, discussion on including Verkle ahead
of EOF and proposal to add EIP7688 SSZ stable container Client team perspectives:
Erigon & Prysm Base proposed Pectra blob increase : client teams generally support
increase of blob target but not max count without PeerDAS, needs more analysis,
IDONTWANT messages should reduce bandwidth PectrA EIP improvements : changes to
validator consolidation in EIP7251, deposit flow in EIP6110, attestation refactoring
in EIP7549 and opaque requests in EIP7685
* Pectra-devnet-3 : issues found by bad block fuzzer being debugged
Pectra-devnet-3 : issues found by bad block fuzzer being debugged
* Pectra split discussion : Pectra scope (PectrA) capped at EIPs in devnet-3 Second
upgrade scope (PectrB) yet to be decided, concerns on scope creep if not frozen,
candidates include PeerDAS & EOF, discussion on including Verkle ahead of EOF and
proposal to add EIP7688 SSZ stable container Client team perspectives: Erigon & Prysm
Base proposed Pectra blob increase : client teams generally support increase of blob
target but not max count without PeerDAS, needs more analysis, IDONTWANT messages
should reduce bandwidth
Pectra split discussion :
* Pectra scope (PectrA) capped at EIPs in devnet-3
Pectra scope (PectrA) capped at EIPs in devnet-3
* Second upgrade scope (PectrB) yet to be decided, concerns on scope creep if not
frozen, candidates include PeerDAS & EOF, discussion on including Verkle ahead of EOF
and proposal to add EIP7688 SSZ stable container
Second upgrade scope (PectrB) yet to be decided, concerns on scope creep if not
* Client team perspectives: Erigon & Prysm
Client team perspectives: Erigon & Prysm
* Base proposed Pectra blob increase : client teams generally support increase of blob
* PectrA EIP improvements : changes to validator consolidation in EIP7251, deposit
flow in EIP6110, attestation refactoring in EIP7549 and opaque requests in EIP7685
Pectra (Prague + Electra) upgrade
* Pectra testing call #5 : Builder specs & remote signer API need updating and more
clients ready for EOF devnet
Pectra testing call #5 :
* Builder specs & remote signer API need updating and more clients ready for EOF
devnet
* Consensus-specs v1.5.0-alpha.6 : minor fixes for Electra, PeerDAS & ePBS
Consensus-specs v1.5.0-alpha.6 : minor fixes for Electra, PeerDAS & ePBS
* EOF implementers call #58 : Discussions on EIP7761 HASCONTRACT for ERC721/1155 NFTs,
EXTCALL return codes and allowing EXTDELEGATECALL to legacy
EOF implementers call #58 :
* Discussions on EIP7761 HASCONTRACT for ERC721/1155 NFTs, EXTCALL return codes and
allowing EXTDELEGATECALL to legacy
* PeerDAS breakout #8 : Debugging local devnet forking issues before launching
peerdas-devnet-2 Validity custody is main remaining spec change before shipping
PeerDAS breakout #8 :
* Debugging local devnet forking issues before launching peerdas-devnet-2
Debugging local devnet forking issues before launching peerdas-devnet-2
* Validity custody is main remaining spec change before shipping
Validity custody is main remaining spec change before shipping
* Distributed block building call #0 video : discussed Dankrad‚Äôs proposal to gossip
sample proofs
Distributed block building call #0 video : discussed Dankrad‚Äôs proposal to gossip
Centralization watch: threatening the value of your ETH
* üö® Lido at 28.1% , still too close to 33.3% threshold
üö® Lido at 28.1% , still too close to 33.3% threshold
* Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ): Execution layer: Geth ~52% majority
Consensus layer: Prysm 37% Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ):
* Execution layer: Geth ~52% majority
Execution layer: Geth ~52% majority
* Consensus layer: Prysm 37%
Consensus layer: Prysm 37%
* Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
* Better geographic diversity is optimal, particularly outside of North America &
Europe
Better geographic diversity is optimal, particularly outside of North America & Europe
Layer 1
* ePBS slot auctions don‚Äôt satisfy No Trusted Advantage
ePBS slot auctions don‚Äôt satisfy No Trusted Advantage
* Terence: FOCIL resource considerations
Terence: FOCIL resource considerations
* Potuz: proposal to decouple execution & consensus layer syncing
Potuz: proposal to decouple execution & consensus layer syncing
* P√©ter Szil√°gyi: SSZ v0.3.0 (library in Go): adds monolithic type support, fixes
decoding zero-length dynamic arrays and adds SizeSSZ
P√©ter Szil√°gyi: SSZ v0.3.0 (library in Go): adds monolithic type support, fixes
* SSZ deserialization differences disclosed between Prysm & Lighthouse
SSZ deserialization differences disclosed between Prysm & Lighthouse
Research
* Variable orbit single slot finality with circular & spiral finality : review of
cumulative committee-based finality under fast-rotating validator committees and
avenues to reduce aggregate finality gap
Client Releases
* Consensus layer: Lodestar v1.22.0 : minor performance optimizations including
shortening startup time
Consensus layer:
* Lodestar v1.22.0 : minor performance optimizations including shortening startup time
* Execution layer: Besu v24.9.1 : adds client version info for consensus layer
graffiti Geth v1.14.9 : adds multicall (eth_simulateV1) support Reth v1.0.7 : adds
multicall (eth_simulateV1) support
Execution layer:
* Besu v24.9.1 : adds client version info for consensus layer graffiti
Besu v24.9.1 : adds client version info for consensus layer graffiti
* Geth v1.14.9 : adds multicall (eth_simulateV1) support
Geth v1.14.9 : adds multicall (eth_simulateV1) support
* Reth v1.0.7 : adds multicall (eth_simulateV1) support
Reth v1.0.7 : adds multicall (eth_simulateV1) support
Layer 2
* Hildobby: L2 blob usage , pruned blobs ~30GB & full history 275GB
Hildobby: L2 blob usage , pruned blobs ~30GB & full history 275GB
* Norswap: cross-chain interoperability overview & applicability to Optimism
Superchain
Norswap: cross-chain interoperability overview & applicability to Optimism Superchain
EIPs/Standards
* EIPs (Ethereum improvement proposals): EIP7768 : No-Ether transactions with
free-for-all tips
EIPs (Ethereum improvement proposals):
* EIP7768 : No-Ether transactions with free-for-all tips
* ERCs (application layer): ERC7769 : JSON-RPC API for ERC4337 (account abstraction)
ERC7770 : Fractional reserve token ERC7771 : Router proxy ERC7772 : Partial gas
sponsorship
ERCs (application layer):
* ERC7769 : JSON-RPC API for ERC4337 (account abstraction)
ERC7769 : JSON-RPC API for ERC4337 (account abstraction)
* ERC7770 : Fractional reserve token
ERC7770 : Fractional reserve token
* ERC7771 : Router proxy
ERC7771 : Router proxy
* ERC7772 : Partial gas sponsorship
ERC7772 : Partial gas sponsorship
Stuff for developers
* Foundry decode internal : trace internal function calls & generate flamegraph/chart
Foundry decode internal : trace internal function calls & generate flamegraph/chart
* Tevm cast : browser based CLI similar to Foundry cast
Tevm cast : browser based CLI similar to Foundry cast
* Hardhat: Hardhat v2.22.11 : adds support for latest Solidity versions
(v0.8.25/26/27) Hardhat-verify v2.0.11 : adds Blockscout verification
Hardhat:
* Hardhat v2.22.11 : adds support for latest Solidity versions (v0.8.25/26/27)
Hardhat v2.22.11 : adds support for latest Solidity versions (v0.8.25/26/27)
* Hardhat-verify v2.0.11 : adds Blockscout verification
Hardhat-verify v2.0.11 : adds Blockscout verification
* Remix v0.54.0 : adds Cookbook templates & GitHub login from file explorer
Remix v0.54.0 : adds Cookbook templates & GitHub login from file explorer
* ERC7726 common quote oracle explainer
ERC7726 common quote oracle explainer
* Huff (language) sunset, repos archived
Huff (language) sunset, repos archived
* Sourcify : 5M verified contracts available to download in Parquet format or zip
Sourcify : 5M verified contracts available to download in Parquet format or zip
* EthereumJS EVM code & dependencies published as un-minified bundle to gist
EthereumJS EVM code & dependencies published as un-minified bundle to gist
* Google Cloud blockchain RPC : mainnet & testnets, free tier up to 100
requests/second
Google Cloud blockchain RPC : mainnet & testnets, free tier up to 100 requests/second
* Semaphore v4 : changed to Lean Incremental Merkle Tree and EdDSA identity schema
Semaphore v4 : changed to Lean Incremental Merkle Tree and EdDSA identity schema
Security
* DeltaPrime $6M exploit on Arbitrum via compromised admin private key
DeltaPrime $6M exploit on Arbitrum via compromised admin private key
* Liquid restaking common vulnerabilities & security risks
Liquid restaking common vulnerabilities & security risks
Ecosystem
* Privacy and Scaling Explorations (PSE): Barry Whitehat leaving, Sam Richards taking
over & some projects sunsetting
Privacy and Scaling Explorations (PSE): Barry Whitehat leaving, Sam Richards taking
* Vitalik: An Ethereum Story (movie): token gated stream via $20 mint, available for 1
month
Vitalik: An Ethereum Story (movie): token gated stream via $20 mint, available for 1
Enterprise
* WisdomTree Connect : tokenized real world assets on mainnet
WisdomTree Connect : tokenized real world assets on mainnet
* Enterprise Ethereum Alliance: DLT interoperability specification v1
Enterprise Ethereum Alliance: DLT interoperability specification v1
Job Listings
* Nethermind: ZK Engineer , Sr Dev , SRE Lead & Sr Embedded Software Dev
Nethermind: ZK Engineer , Sr Dev , SRE Lead & Sr Embedded Software Dev
* Gnosis seek CoreDevs , Sr Algorithm Engineer , Sr Smart Contract Engineer
Gnosis seek CoreDevs , Sr Algorithm Engineer , Sr Smart Contract Engineer
* Nomos is hiring Ecosystem Developer , Rust Engineer & Applied Researcher !
Nomos is hiring Ecosystem Developer , Rust Engineer & Applied Researcher !
* Status free.technology is hiring a Business Developer . More jobs at IFT!
Status free.technology is hiring a Business Developer . More jobs at IFT!
* Join Witnet as a Community Builder ! Full-time, remote opportunity.
Join Witnet as a Community Builder ! Full-time, remote opportunity.
Job listings: $600 for 4 issues (75 char limit). Pay using 3cities. Questions?
abcoathup at-gmail
Onchain stats
* Fees (via ultrasound.money ): Gas: 0.7 to 85.6 gwei, 6.7 gwei average; zero net
issuance at 24.2 gwei 12k ETH net issuance this week
Fees (via ultrasound.money ):
* Gas: 0.7 to 85.6 gwei, 6.7 gwei average; zero net issuance at 24.2 gwei
Gas: 0.7 to 85.6 gwei, 6.7 gwei average; zero net issuance at 24.2 gwei
* 12k ETH net issuance this week
12k ETH net issuance this week
* ETHUSD : $2,268 - $2,577, currently $2,556, all time high $4,878
ETHUSD : $2,268 - $2,577, currently $2,556, all time high $4,878
* ETHBTC : currently 0.041 (Flippening at ~0.164)
ETHBTC : currently 0.041 (Flippening at ~0.164)
Notable at app layer
* Sky (formerly Maker) USDS stablecoin & SKY governance token live on mainnet
Sky (formerly Maker) USDS stablecoin & SKY governance token live on mainnet
* 1inch Fusion+ : atomic cross-chain swaps, beta
1inch Fusion+ : atomic cross-chain swaps, beta
* eth.link : ENS gateway now powered by eth.limo
eth.link : ENS gateway now powered by eth.limo
Regulation/business/tokens
* US SEC end of fiscal year actions: FlyfishClub settled for selling NFT restaurant
memberships prior to opening Commissioners Peirce & Uyeda : ‚Äúsecurities laws are not
needed here, and their application is harmful both in the present case and as future
precedent‚Äù Rari Capital charged with misleading investors & acting as unregistered
brokers Prager Metis (auditors) settled for negligence in FTX audits
* FlyfishClub settled for selling NFT restaurant memberships prior to opening
Commissioners Peirce & Uyeda : ‚Äúsecurities laws are not needed here, and their
application is harmful both in the present case and as future precedent‚Äù
FlyfishClub settled for selling NFT restaurant memberships prior to opening
* Commissioners Peirce & Uyeda : ‚Äúsecurities laws are not needed here, and their
* Rari Capital charged with misleading investors & acting as unregistered brokers
Rari Capital charged with misleading investors & acting as unregistered brokers
* Prager Metis (auditors) settled for negligence in FTX audits
Prager Metis (auditors) settled for negligence in FTX audits
General
* BingX (centralized exchange) hot wallet compromised
BingX (centralized exchange) hot wallet compromised
* ZackXBT: $243M in BTC stolen from one person via social engineering, two suspects
arrested
ZackXBT: $243M in BTC stolen from one person via social engineering, two suspects
* Discord audio & video end-to-end encryption rolling out, doesn‚Äôt include group chats
& DMs
Discord audio & video end-to-end encryption rolling out, doesn‚Äôt include group chats &
DMs
END OF SERVICE: plan to deprecate Week in Ethereum News
Editor: @abcoathup Follow @WeekinEthNews for the most clicked links Permalink:
https://weekinethereumnews.com/week-in-ethereum-news-september-21-2024

Oct 4-6 ‚Äì ETHRome hackathon
